ygData.subject: Re: Fletching costs
ygData.msgSnippet: We have been talking about this in the Ranger mailing list and you don t get any more chances for your money. You only get a skill check per bunch of 5 arrows.
ygData.messageBody:
We have been talking about this in the Ranger mailing
list and you don't get any more chances for your
money.

You only get a skill check per bunch of 5 arrows. if I
recall the prices for the items went up. The most
basic tip was 1 copper and went to 6 copper for the
ability to make 5. A raw deal for sure as some people
went to near 200 with a much lower cost.

Belgarth Wolfstrider

-----------------------------------

Message: 5
Date: Mon, 14 Jun 1999 15:42:52 PDT
From: Vytautas Dwarf/Paladin
<vytautasthedwarf@...>
Subject: I'm at skill 160 and wasting Plat like crazy


Before the patch my skill was 159. At this skill lvl I
was using a (field,
wooden, ceramic, large) bundle/combination to raise my
skill. After the
patch I decided to try to raise my skill some more. I
wasted close to 40
plat after selling the made arrows back to the NPC to
raise my lvl to 160. I
had to buy 30 bundles (costing about 3.5 plat a
bundle) to raise my skill
one point. Therefore, I am wondering, since
everything now costs 5 times as
much, do we get 5 times the chance to raise our skill
with each try? I
don't believe so, since that would have given me 150
tries to raise my lvl 1
point. Am I right? or am I doing something wrong?
